医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
立陶宛科学家开发出改善血液循环的非侵入性装置下肢血液循环受损是老年人常见的健康问题，也是糖尿病最突出的并发症之一，即糖尿病足。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Lithuanian-scientists-develop-non-pressive-device-to-improve-blood-circulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Lithuanian-scientists-develop-non-induced-device-to-improve-blood-circulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f82c993a-1b71-4a56-b742-8d5a1585340c Thu, 07 Nov 2024 12:37:00 -0500 Lithuanian scientists develop non-invasive device to improve blood circulation
虚拟筛选产生小分子以增强癌症免疫治疗威尔康奈尔医学研究人员表示，通过虚拟筛选，识别针对癌症检查点的有前途的小分子候选药物的过程可能会变得更快、更智能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Virtual-screening-yields-small-molecules-to-enhance-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Virtual-screening-yields-small-molecules-to-enhance-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8fc1891-c589-4d39-8b97-b649b4478df0 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 12:30:14 -0500 Virtual screening yields small molecules to enhance cancer immunotherapy
研究强调前列腺癌治疗的长期风险前列腺癌治疗产生的不良反应和并发症的风险很大，并且在治疗结束后仍会持续数年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Study-highlights-long-term-risks-of-prostate-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Study-highlights-long-term-risks-of-prostate-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec82eb74-f1bc-4cfc-92b3-56eec03f7033 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 12:22:03 -0500 Study highlights long-term risks of prostate cancer treatment
密歇根州研究发现虚拟护理不会导致医疗资源浪费在 2024 年结束之前，国会将决定是否保留或更改有关远程医疗的规则，或者让它们失效。尽管该决定将重点关注医疗保险对虚拟患者护理的支付，但它也可能会影响拥有其他类型健康保险的人获得远程医疗服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Michigan-study-finds-virtual-care-does-not-lead-to-wastage-of-healthcare-resources.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Michigan-study-finds-virtual-care-does-not-lead-to-wastage-of-healthcare-resources.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c92f9a29-3b72-4aed-9020-c8c72b2f6236 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 12:18:10 -0500 Michigan study finds virtual care does not lead to wastage of healthcare resources
研究将自我效能感与青少年更好的糖尿病管理联系起来自我效能感涉及一个人对自己成功完成任务的能力的信念。自 20 世纪 80 年代以来，心理学家阿尔伯特·班杜拉 (Albert Bandura) 对这一心理结构进行了研究，事实证明，它不仅对认知过程有影响，而且对行为和情绪也有影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Research-links-self-efficacy-to-better-diabetes-management-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Research-links-self-efficacy-to-better-diabetes-management-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98530d73-b7ee-4af8-9a2b-dcb0e7df59d4 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 12:05:25 -0500 Research links self-efficacy to better diabetes management in adolescents
SfN 2024：神经科学与社区、协作和创新的结合在 SfN 2024 上，神经科学家齐聚一堂，分享突破性的研究成果，促进跨学科联系并增进对大脑的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/SfN-2024-Where-neuroscience-meets-community-collaboration-and-innovation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/SfN-2024-Where-neuroscience-meets-community-collaboration-and-innovation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7a1c80a-9332-48de-bbfa-60ae2eab6571 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 11:26:00 -0500 SfN 2024: Where neuroscience meets community, collaboration, and innovation
六价疫苗可以减少百日咳的传播埃丝特·纳卡齐 (Esther Nakkazi) 写道，全面覆盖六价疫苗可以预防百日咳和脊髓灰质炎，避免疾病复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Hexavalent-vaccine-can-reduce-spread-of-whooping-cough.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Hexavalent-vaccine-can-reduce-spread-of-whooping-cough.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8d39b3a-c3d7-42e8-aeb5-bfaddd6c6e70 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 09:58:12 -0500 Hexavalent vaccine can reduce spread of whooping cough
新的 NCCN 指南包括扩大对各种癌症的遗传风险评估国家综合癌症网络 (NCCN)——一个由领先癌症中心组成的联盟，专注于维持以证据为基础的专家共识驱动的护理指南——宣布出版扩展版 NCCN 肿瘤学临床实践指南（NCCN 指南）的遗传/家族性疾病高风险评估：乳房、卵巢、胰腺和前列腺。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-NCCN-guidelines-include-expanded-genic-risk-assessment-for-various-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-NCCN-guidelines-include-expanded-genic-risk-assessment-for-various-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bb1c020-44ed-497d-8a4f-e256ff6354af Thu, 07 Nov 2024 09:55:00 -0500 New NCCN guidelines include expanded genetic risk assessment for various cancers
浆果味电子烟会损害肺部免疫反应接触浆果味电子烟后，AM 功能发生改变，导致对病原体的免疫反应不佳并降低宿主存活率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Berry-flavored-vapes-impair-lung-immune-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Berry-flavored-vapes-impair-lung-immune-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62ea7de6-02a7-4721-afd8-051a87f511a3 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 09:51:00 -0500 Berry-flavored vapes impair lung immune response
研究人员发现 41 个与椎间盘突出症相关的新基因区域腰椎间盘突出症是下背部最常见的结构变化之一，也是腿部放射痛或坐骨神经痛的最常见原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Researchers-find-41-new-genic-regions-linked-to-disc-herniations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Researchers-find-41-new-genic-regions-linked-to-disc-herniations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=520b30f5-c43a-4c4b-a7f7-da484e97975a Thu, 07 Nov 2024 09:50:08 -0500 Researchers find 41 new genetic regions linked to disc herniations
